original: BJÖRKMAN, Gunnar, Disponent, Örebro, f Köpings Idsförsaml 23/2 86 av lantmät Axel B o Maria Törngren, gm Anna-Lisa Carlsson. Hal, Örebro tekn gymn 07. Ing v Lilla Edets Pappersbruk 08—12, övering v Örebro Pappersbruk 13—18 o disp samt vkst dir där sed. 19, tillika vkst dir i öbr—Skebäcks Jvgs AB sed. 25, i Frövifors Bruks AB sed. 28, i Bates Paper Sack AB sed. 36 o i öbr Cementfabr AB sed. 39. Styr.ordf i Edvard Schneidler AB sed. 30, v. ordf i AB Gbgs Bks avd.kont sed. 33, Styr.led i öbr Rederi AB sed. 35, i öbr Elektr AB sed. 38, huvudm i öbr Sparbk sed. 41. Förtroenderådsled i Scankraft sed. 29, ordf i Scanpapp sed. 40. Led av Beirat f Vereinig Internat Papier- u Pappenkartell. Sakk h Komm.koll betr halmförädling 32, led av halmindustrisakk 37—38. Stdsflm, led av drätselkamm, v. ordf i hdlskamm:s arb.utsk o skiljenmd, har inneh en mängd kommunala uppdrag. V. ordf i öbr Skyttefrn o öbr Läns Skyttefrb. Resor: Norge, Danm, Finl, Tyskl, Tjeckoslov, Österr, Frankr, Holl, Belg, Engl, USA o Canada uppr ggr. RNO, RVO, öbr Skyttefrns o öbr L Skyttefrbs ftjGM, Skyttefrb^ överstyr :s ftjSM, Sv Jägarefrbs Ht g. Hobbies: Jakt, fiske, gammalt silver.
translated: BJÖRKMAN, Gunnar, Office Manager, Örebro, b. Köpings Idsförsaml 23/2 86 to surveyor Axel B and Maria Törngren, m. Anna-Lisa Carlsson. Graduated from Örebro Technical Gymnasium in 1907. Employed at Lilla Edets Pappersbruk 1908-1912, promoted at Örebro Pappersbruk 1913-1918 and served as Office Manager and Deputy Managing Director since then. Also served as Deputy Managing Director at öbr—Skebäcks Jvgs AB since 1925, at Frövifors Bruks AB since 1928, at Bates Paper Sack AB since 1936, and at öbr Cementfabr AB since 1939. Chairman of the Board at Edvard Schneidler AB since 1930, Vice Chairman of AB Gbgs Bks avd.kont since 1933, Board Member of öbr Rederi AB since 1935, of öbr Elektr AB since 1938, and Chief Executive Officer of öbr Sparbk since 1941. Member of the Advisory Board for Vereinig Internat Papier-u Pappenkartell. Expert on straw processing for the Trade Commission in 1932, member of the straw industry committee in 1937-1938. Member of the City Film Council, member of the Municipal Council, Vice Chairman of the Chamber of Commerce's Labor Committee and Arbitrator. Held numerous municipal assignments. Vice Chairman of öbr Skyttefrn and öbr Läns Skyttefrb. Travelled to Norway, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Czechoslovakia, Austria, France, the Netherlands, Belgium, England, USA and Canada on several occasions. Received the Royal Order of the North Star (RNO), the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO), öbr Skyttefrns and öbr L Skyttefrbs ftjGM, and the Skyttefrb's Chief Board Medal. Hobbies: Hunting, fishing, antique silver.
